page.title: 16OAK STONES / W.I.
page.content: The 0akstones old people's club was formed 26 years ago and still has two of the{original members both of whom are now over 90 years old.People start when they are 60.They have a special meeting every month where they are entertained and have tea, cakes and scones.They have an {annual coffee morning}and a{garden {party}and once or twice a year they go on{outings}when they like to stop for fish and chips.They have a{Christmas {dinner. Ladies can start going to the {Women's Institute}when they are 16.There are 45 members.The W.I. holds monthly meetings. This year they have had{talks}on Poland and Canada, soft toy making and flower arranging. They also have competitions. Once a year there is a{garden party.}They also go on outings.
